name: Karaoke Player Playlist
summary: Learn about .VPL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: VPL files can be printed by opening the file in a text editor or spreadsheet program and selecting "Print."

description: Contains a list of songs to be played with vanBasco's Karaoke Player; includes references to song files, such as Karaoke (.KAR) and MIDI (.MID) files, but does not include actual MIDI or karaoke data.
